mapper.select: /* YoutubeDAO.targetList */ select file_no , file_path_prefix , file_path , file_name from tb_file where file_ext_type like 'video%' and file_use_yn = 'Y' and file_del_yn = 'N' and youtube_id is null and file_no not in ( select file_no from tb_youtube_target ) order by file_no desc limit 10
